### Generate mapping file
The hg19 can be found at ftp://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/grch37/current/gtf</br>
```{r}
if(!file.exists("./data/hg19/geneid_genename.rds")){
  gz_path = "./data/hg19/Homo_sapiens.GRCh37.87.gtf.gz"
  mapping = get_geneid_genename_mapping(gz_path)
  mapping_vector = mapping[, 2]
  names(mapping_vector) = mapping[, 1]
  saveRDS(mapping_vector, "./data/hg19/geneid_genename.rds")
}else{
  print("Mapping...exists!")
}
print("Mapping...OK!")

```
